Keywords: Acolytes , Brotherhood of Mutants , Deity , Politician , Quiet Council , Ruler , X-Men
Real Name: Max Eisenhardt
Special Powers
TARGETING: Characters
EXECUTING MOIRA’S PLAN: Energy Shield/Deflection. Mastermind, but he may choose a friendly character within 4 squares and line of fire instead of adjacent.
BREAKING HUMAN NORMS: Leadership. // FREE: If no other friendly character has been placed this turn, choose an opposing character within range that attacked Magneto or damaged a friendly character with the X-Men keyword since your last turn. Place Magneto such that he can make a range attack targeting the chosen character, then do so targeting only that character.

kinda wish he had TK on this click instead of EE
January 22, 2021
tidge
I've never been a great fan of the single-click figures/BSTs meant to serve as 'part of a force', but this 25-point dial offers utility, offense, Willpower, mobility, and with Mastermind (and common keywords) it stands a chance at surviving. I'd like this figure a LOT more if the Energy Shield/Deflection and Mastermind were not part of the same special white power, as a single Outwit is stripping him completely of defenses. I know it isn't everyone's jam: If you need effective TAXIs for certain keyword teams and don't care about multiple characters with the same name, MagneBSTo may be the choice for you.
